abstract: Markets in the United States on Tuesday erased most of their losses from Monday, as Walgreen led a rally in consumer staples and health companies Investors also speculated that the Federal Reserve would buy more debt to safeguard the economy.
snippet: Markets in the United States on Tuesday erased most of their losses from Monday, as Walgreen led a rally in consumer staples and health companies Investors also speculated that the Federal Reserve would buy more debt to safeguard the economy.
lead_paragraph: Markets in the United States on Tuesday erased most of their losses from Monday, as Walgreen led a rally in consumer staples and health companies Investors also speculated that the Federal Reserve would buy more debt to safeguard the economy.

headline.main: Healthcare Helps Wall Street Rebound Quickly
